scripts.preinstall: [[ $INIT_CWD == $(realpath ..) ]] || (echo "The yarn install must be called on the workspace root." 1>&2 ; exit 1;);
scripts.pregit:clean:check: [ -f .gitignore ] || (echo "No .gitignore file found at the package root." 1>&2 ;);
scripts.pregit:clean:force: [ -f .gitignore ] || (echo "No .gitignore file found at the package root." 1>&2 ; exit 1;);
